articles.title: Explained: How rising fuel prices will hit input costs of farm operations - The Indian Express
articles.description: Escalating fuel prices are set to burn a hole in the pocket of already stressed farming community. Here's how rising prices of petrol and diesel are set to increase the input cost of farming sector by 28 per cent compared to last year.
